## Program description 

To run the program "run_analysis.R", you must have data in Dataset folder.
Dataset folder must be in you working directory.
Dataset folder must contain train and test folders.

## Variables description
loading variables have the same name as the file without extension. 
Ex: file X_test.txt is loaded into variable X_test

Merged variables have the same name, without _test or _train
Ex : X_test and X_train are merged into X

Output dataset:
- X and y : dataset for questions 1, 2, 3, 4
- X_summarized : dataset for question 5
